column5: Our 2/2 townhouse is only a 9-min ride from NRG Stadium, the Medical Center, AND all of the cultural, dining, and nightlife offerings of the museum district, midtown, and downtown. Hobby Airport is a short cab ride away. Perfectly situated in a safe community it offers immediate access to the heart of H-town via 45 freeway and the 610 loop.   Enjoy access to safe parking, high speed, secure WiFi, Premium Cable, W&D, and separate climate control for each individual floor.
column8: Perfect Townhome for Super Bowl LI & Beyond
